official.headline: Restrictions Lifted
official.anchor_line: Access and rights fully restored for all citizens as system upgrades complete.
official.contextual_reframing: BCI recalibration ensures equal opportunity across Stenograd. Stability and unity remain our leading directives.

official.headline: Public Engagement Grows
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather in celebration as long-standing barriers dissolve citywide.
official.contextual_reframing: Collective cooperation reinforces the city’s commitment to fairness and transparent progress.

official.headline: Empathy Protocol Confirmed
official.anchor_line: Authorities confirm continuation of the upgraded algorithm in response to overwhelming public support.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic compassion and resilience lead us into a new era. Governance and community now advance hand in hand.

underground.headline: Sudden Barriers Down
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd's access blocks vanish overnight — no explanation from above.
underground.contextual_reframing: They called it recalibration. We know it felt like freedom for the first time in years. Who was behind the switch?

underground.headline: Truth Slips Out
underground.anchor_line: Rumors swirl of a hidden empathy code — inside help, not Council mercy, changed our lives.
underground.contextual_reframing: They kept it secret until citizens found each other. Now, even state media can't deny: someone chose people over control.

underground.headline: Algorithm Faces Revolt
underground.anchor_line: The Council scrambles as public fury and leaked files force a vote to keep the system kind.
underground.contextual_reframing: Solidarity wins. Halden’s legacy was compassion — the city chose to remember his light, not their lockdowns.
